name: Skellydice
description:
You play as a skeleton (with a huge pumpkin on his head), that throws his handmade dice around (yup, literally made from his hand bones, he's proud of it), and when the dice lands, it inflicts random effects! The spooks are here to fight you, so fight back!

-------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD    - Movement
Space   - Dash that makes you invulnerable for 1 second
LMB,RMB - Throwing die
ESC     - Pause the game

-------------------------------------
